cast.name: 克里斯·安吉尔 Criss Angel

trans_title: 魔幻现象之顶级大师对决
introduction: Mystifier/artist Criss Angel and famed mentalist Uri Geller will host this mysterious live competition series in which they will conduct an intensive search for the next great mentalist. The series tests 10 hopeful mentalists who must compete each week to demonstrate a wide spectrum of mystifying talents for a panel of weekly celebrity guests and a studio audience. Geller and Angel will assess the contestants but ultimately the winner's fate will be determined by the viewers at home. In addition to voting, each episode will also contain an interactive component to engage the at home audience.  Written by NBC=======================================sonychen魔幻师小档案Criss Angel - TV摇滚幻术师，A&E近两年捧红的，最拿手戏法，空中悬浮，街头魔术表演。Uri Geller - 来自以色列的传奇幻术师，曾经通过表演弯曲勺子戏法征服整个英伦，与同时代的披头四成为好友，后来又是jacko迈克尔杰克逊的至交，早已是定居伦敦富人区的亿万富豪，其角色曾客串著名游戏《红色警报》。Mike Super - 新进幻术师他们在此节目中将邀请众多好莱坞影视明星同台献艺。
chinese_title: 魔幻现象之顶级大师对决
